#labels Phase-Deploy,Phase-Support
#Installation guide for the 'newspaper_in_pdf.rb'.


= Pre-requisite =
* Linux box with wget ;* 
* Install Ruby (sudo apt-get install ruby) ;*
* Install Ruby gems (sudo gem install htree) ;*
* Install pdftk(pdf toolkit) (sudo apt-get install pdftk) ;*
* Above tested on Ubuntu 8.04 ;*


= Execution =
* start the terminal ;*
* change directory to the source code ;*
* type 'ruby yangtse.rb' and press 'Enter' button ;*
